participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep connections and conversations.
participant_1.background: I'm a runner who never brings my weapons into the kitchen. i don t have children. i like listening to other rap music too. i blame myself for all of my problems. I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, values relationships and enjoys quiet moments with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I curl up with a good book and my pets. penn teller are my favorite magicians. I hold my loved ones closest to my heart because they are the ones who matter most. i cannot stand salads. i went to college.

content.text: I'm doing well. Thanks for asking. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to curl up with a good book and my pets.
That sounds nice. I like to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
Those are both great genres. I've been reading a lot of fantasy lately.
What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a series called The Stormlight Archive by Brandon Sanderson. It's really good.
I've heard good things about that series. I might have to check it out.
I definitely recommend it. It's a little slow to start, but it gets really good.
I'm not afraid of a slow start. I'll check it out.
Awesome! I hope you like it.
